description: This file defines a REST controller class 'TemplateController' for managing CRUD operations related to templates in a web application. It exposes endpoints for creating, retrieving, listing, updating, and deleting template entities via HTTP requests. The controller interacts with the 'TemplateService' to perform business logic and includes security annotations to restrict access based on user roles.

classes.name: TemplateController
classes.description: REST controller for managing Templates with CRUD endpoints, secured with role-based access control.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new template using provided request data.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves a template by its ID.

methods.name: listByPartner
methods.description: Lists templates associated with a partner, with pagination support.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing template identified by ID.
